DialogueText.Text: Wow... I can't believe I'm really here! These ruins... I'm certain they hold so much of the Monks' forgotten knowledge as well as the tablet we're looking for. It'll be a true honor to learn from what they left behind.
Now's the time to use the Wayfinder. It should allow us to enter, and we'll be able to begin our exploration!
Aha! It really worked! The spell over the ruins has been dispersed for the time being. Let's head on-
Excellent work you two! We've had our eyes on these ruins for quite a while, and now you've done us the favor of removing its protective seal! You have our thanks.
We won't let you enter this place!
You're welcome to try, but do you think you'll be able to stop all of us?
